name: Alienware Aurora R12
description: The Alienware Aurora R12 is a high-performance gaming PC with a sleek design, powered by the latest Intel processors and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 graphics card.

name: MSI Trident 3
description: The MSI Trident 3 is a compact yet powerful gaming PC, perfect for small spaces. It comes with an Intel Core i5 processor and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super.

name: HP Omen 30L
description: The HP Omen 30L is a powerhouse with a customizable design, featuring an AMD Ryzen 9 processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070, ideal for high-end gaming.

name: Corsair One i160
description: The Corsair One i160 is a top-tier gaming PC, equipped with an Intel Core i9 processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090, delivering unbeatable performance.

name: CyberPowerPC Gamer Xtreme VR
description: The CyberPowerPC Gamer Xtreme VR is a budget-friendly gaming PC that doesn't compromise on performance, featuring an Intel Core i7 and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060.

name: NZXT Streaming Plus PC
description: The NZXT Streaming Plus PC is optimized for gaming and streaming, featuring an AMD Ryzen 7 processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Super.
